synopsis.text:
Although living a mundane life as an orphan, Lu Shu's world takes a drastic turn when a car accident triggers the awakening of his supernatural abilities. As the world enters an era where magic and mystical powers become prevalent, Lu Shu discovers his unique talent: the ability to harness and grow stronger from the negative emotions of others. Desiring nothing more than to safeguard his beloved younger sister, Lu Xiaoyu, Lu Shu embarks on a journey to master his powers and confront the challenges that lie ahead.

As they traverse the changing landscape of their country, Lu Shu and Xiaoyu encounter powerful individuals and unravel the mysteries surrounding the magical era. Despite the uncertainties and potential threats, Lu Shu remains resolute in his quest to become the strongest, even if it means embracing his destiny as the 'Super Demon.' With his unyielding determination and unconventional abilities, Lu Shu is set to leave his mark on the world and defy the odds in this thrilling tale of power, growth, and sibling love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
